com.camerontec.catalys.server.component

Interface IComponentStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultComponentStatus

    public interface IComponentStatus
    Used to expose the state of an IComponent for monitoring purposes.

    State is defined as a Collection of NameValue objects, which are just key value pairs.

    This status is dynamic in that you can register standard ICatalysEventListener's to listen to the status. They will be notified by AttributeChangeEvent's whenever the state changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttributeChangeListener(ICatalysEventListener listener, boolean removeOnException)
      Register a listener for changes of state.
      Object getStatus(String statusKey)
      Return the value of a particular named element of the state.
      Collection<NameValue> getStatusEntries()
      Returns snapshot of current state.
      boolean removeAttributeChangeListener(ICatalysEventListener listener)

      Sets the value of the first element with this key in the state.

    • Method Detail

      • addAttributeChangeListener

        void addAttributeChangeListener(ICatalysEventListener listener,
                                boolean removeOnException)
        Register a listener for changes of state.
        Parameters:
        listener - Object that will receive state change notifications in the form of AttributeChangeEvent's.
        removeOnException - If true, the listener will automatically be removed if it throws an exception when notified.

      • removeAttributeChangeListener

        boolean removeAttributeChangeListener(ICatalysEventListener listener)
        Remove a state change listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if listener was found.

      • getStatus

        Object getStatus(String statusKey)
        Return the value of a particular named element of the state.
        Parameters:
        statusKey - Name of state element.
        Returns:
        Value of named element or null if no such element.

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(String statusKey,
               Object value)
        Sets the value of the first element with this key in the state. If no such element exists, one is created. If the value is null, the element is removed from the state.
        Parameters:
        statusKey - Name of state element.
        value - New value of named element. If null, the element is removed.

      • getStatusEntries

        Collection<NameValue> getStatusEntries()
        Returns snapshot of current state.
        Returns:
        All status information in form of NameValue's.
